Description of incident: Barrinton Orthopedic Specialists notified patients of data breach when a laptop and EMG machince was stolen from their offices. The information compromised included patient names, dates of birth and EMG results and reports. More information: http://www.barringtonortho.com/sites/barringtonortho.com/files/HIPAA_Pat...http://healthitsecurity.com/news/theft-printing-error-lead-to-health-dat...
